titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 25th anniversary of the Space Foundation.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2485)
Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
9/22/2008--Passed Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Recognizes the contributions made by the Space Foundation and commemorates it's 25 years of excellence and support to the nation.
